properties.Ingredients:
For foule 1.14 oz can of cooked n- beans\ 3 medium n- Roma tomatoes\1 n- lemon \1 n- garlic glove\1 bunch of curly n- parsley
-salt
- pepper
properties.Recipe:
1. Tomatoes one inch thick and add to a serving bowl. Chop parsley, dice garlic. I prefer the parsley as an ingredient not a garnish so I add the whole bunch.
2. Warm the beans either on stove or in microwave.
3. Mince fresh garlic and add to the sauteed diced onions.
4. Add hot beans, salt, and pepper to taste and mix.
5. Drench with olive oil.
6. Serve with warm pita bread.",
